```py
>>> from scipy import ndimage
>>> import numpy as np
>>> a = np.array([[1, 2, 0, 1],
...               [5, 3, 0, 4],
...               [0, 0, 0, 7],
...               [9, 3, 0, 0]])
>>> labels, labels_nb = ndimage.label(a)
>>> labels
array([[1, 1, 0, 2],
 [1, 1, 0, 2],
 [0, 0, 0, 2],
 [3, 3, 0, 0]])
>>> ndimage.median(a, labels=labels, index=np.arange(1, labels_nb + 1))
[2.5, 4.0, 6.0]
>>> ndimage.median(a)
1.0
>>> ndimage.median(a, labels=labels)
3.0 
```
